scripts.build: PUBLIC_URL=./ react-scripts build && cd build && zip -r build.zip * && cd -
scripts.build:notes: echo $(git rev-parse --short=7 HEAD | tr -d [:punct:]).$(git config --global user.name | sed 's/ //g')
scripts.minis:create: npm run build && echo $(npm run minis:id --silent) && snapdev minis build create -p $(npm run minis:id --silent)  -f build/build.zip  -n $(npm run build:notes --silent) -v $(npm run build:version --silent)  -d
scripts.minis:create-rapid: snapdev minis build create -p $(npm run minis:id --silent) -d -u $(npm run rapid:host --silent)/ -n $(npm run rapid:host --silent)/ -v $(npm run rapid:version --silent)
scripts.minis:release: snapdev minis release create -p $(npm run minis:id --silent) -m ee556332-8b38-4f7c-8b2c-04d77c23cc10 -n $(npm run build:version --silent)
scripts.minis:target: snapdev minis release target -p  $(npm run minis:id --silent)
